data.title: Selected State Child Labor Standards Affecting Minors Under 18 in Non-farm Employment as of June 13, 2024
data.text:
Historical Tables

Select a State:

8 hours daily / 40 hours weekly/ 6 days weekly.

Workers 16 and up ma work up to 40 hours in one week.

Maximum hours/days when school is in session:

3 hours daily/ 18 hours weekly

Prepared By:

Division of Fair Labor Standards Act and Child Labor

Wage and Hour Division

U.S. Department of Labor

This document was last revised in June 13, 2024.

The Department of Labor does not administer State laws. Please consult your State’s Department of Labor for details on your State’s requirements.
